title: Office 2016 coming on September 22
text:
Office 2016 coming on September 22 Published: 11 September 2015 8:09 AM 
Microsoft PowerPoint on Windows 10: the latest version of the productivity suite is arriving for the PC on September 22. – AFP/Relaxnews pic, September 11, 2015. The first version of Microsoft's Office suite developed specifically for Windows 10 is just days from landing on the PC desktop. 
As well as being optimised for the latest version of Microsoft's operating system, the new update will bring some smart features, such as real-time co-authoring and much better integration with the cloud. 
Although services such as Evernote and Google Drive are beginning to get to a point where they're good enough for many consumers' needs, Office is still the best package out there for spread sheets, fully compatible presentations and of course word processing. 
So, if you already have an Office 365 Personal or Office 365 Home subscription, from September 22 you'll be able to start downloading individual apps while automatic updates will start popping up on the desktop from October. – AFP/Relaxnews, September 11,
